Package pepse.world.trees

package pepse.world.trees
This package deals with all that is related to the objects in the game area.

Leaf - A class that creates the leaf in the game. Log - A class that creates the log of the tree. TreeFruit - A class that creates the fruit on the trees. flora - the class that integrates all the classes to create a full tree.

Author:
Noam shabat, Samuel Hayat
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    pepse.world
    This package contains the classes that are used to represent the world in the simulation.
    pepse.world.daynight
    This package deals with all that is related to the day / night like the sun or the creation of a fake night to imitate the real day.
    pepse.world.UI
    this class is responsible to display the energy of the avatar to the player
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Flora
    Handles the creation of trees within the game, implementing tree generation logic.
    Leaf
    Refactored Leaf class that represents a single leaf game object.
    Log
    A class that represents a single log game object
    TreeFruit
    A class that represents a single tree fruit game object
